label: ProductBatch
comment: A group of products considered or dealt with together.

datatypeProperties.comment: The evaluation of an object, such as a product, process, or organization, with respect to the object's worth or condition.
An unattractive or unsatisfactory characteristic.
The process of certifying that a certain product batch has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a group of products considered or dealt with together.
A document issued by a government, public organization or association to certify a property of a person, entity, process or object.
Any material with which supply chain goods are packaged, such as a box or bubble wrap.
Any substance such as seed, fertilizer, water, gas or chemical applied to an agricultural field, substrate, construction, plant, animal or product.
A chemical treatment applied during this production process.
A product finishing treatment applied during this production process.
A treatment, expressed as text, applied to this crop produce batch.
A buyer assigned identifier of this product batch.
A substance from which something is or could be made.
A trade product component of this product batch.
The creation date, time, date time, or other date time value for this payment trade settlement.
The DNA marker identifier of this product batch.
A code specifying a description of this technical characteristic.
A manufacturer assigned identifier of this product batch.
The product name, expressed as text, for this crop produce batch.
The code specifying the production mode for this product batch.
A seller assigned identifier of this product batch.
A legal proof of ownership, worthiness or qualification to operate an agricultural item.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an agricultural object.
A statement that user needs of the present are met without compromising the needs of future generations.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
A reference to a physical location or place.
A textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.
A photograph or video still represented as a digital image for electronic sharing.
A production process specified for this product batch.
A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a product batch has met required criteria.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a group of products considered or dealt with together.
A significant occurrence or happening in a supply chain.

referencedBy.comment: A product batch applicable to this supply chain trade line item.
A product batch included in this supply chain inventory.
An input batch applicable to this production machine.
An output batch applicable to this specified production device.
A product batch related to this trade party.
A substitute product batch applicable to this supply chain trade line item.
A substituted product batch applicable to this supply chain trade line item.
